QuestData.Title: Catch!
QuestData.Description: <The hatchling looks up at you with a bored, listless expression.>$B$BYou have a feeling the serpent is tired of being cooped up all day.$B$B How about playing a little game of catch?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Bouncy Ball. Then, catch and return the ball to your hatchling 8 times.
